EntityResponse.description: A DataHub 'entity', which is comprised of a set of latest aspects present for the aspect.

aspects.description: A map of aspect name to aspect

EnvelopedAspect.description:
An aspect, along with the metadata about it.
Currently, an aspect can be either of type 'timestamp' or 'versioned'.

type.description: The type of the aspect, either timeseries or versioned

version.description: The version of the aspect, only populated if type is 'VERSIONED'

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the aspect, only populated if type is 'TIMESTAMP'

value.description: The raw value of the aspect

created.description: The audit stamp detailing who the aspect was created by and when

systemMetadata.description: The system metadata for this aspect

AspectType.description: The type of a DataHub aspect

AuditStamp.description: Data captured on a resource/association/sub-resource level giving insight into when that resource/association/sub-resource moved into a particular lifecycle stage, and who acted to move it into that specific lifecycle stage.

time.description: When did the resource/association/sub-resource move into the specific lifecycle stage represented by this AuditEvent.

actor.description: The entity (e.g. a member URN) which will be credited for moving the resource/association/sub-resource into the specific lifecycle stage. It is also the one used to authorize the change.

impersonator.description: The entity (e.g. a service URN) which performs the change on behalf of the Actor and must be authorized to act as the Actor.

message.description: Additional context around how DataHub was informed of the particular change. For example: was the change created by an automated process, or manually.

SystemMetadata.description: Metadata associated with each metadata change that is processed by the system

lastObserved.description: The timestamp the metadata was observed at

runId.description: The original run id that produced the metadata. Populated in case of batch-ingestion.

lastRunId.description: The last run id that produced the metadata. Populated in case of batch-ingestion.

pipelineName.description: The ingestion pipeline id that produced the metadata. Populated in case of batch ingestion.

registryName.description: The model registry name that was used to process this event

registryVersion.description: The model registry version that was used to process this event

version.description:
Aspect version
   Initial implementation will use the aspect version's number, however stored as
   a string in the case where a different aspect versioning scheme is later adopted.

aspectCreated.description: When the aspect was initially created and who created it, detected by version 0 -> 1 change

aspectModified.description: When the aspect was last modified and the actor that performed the modification
